Projects.Name: User management system
Projects.Description:
Contributed to the design, development, and testing of a web application used for managing users across a large-scale microservice-based system in the technical protection domain.
I implemented a user management system, including features for role-based access control, user lifecycle management, and integration with other services within the ecosystem.

Projects.Name: Visitor announcement system
Projects.Description:
Worked on design, development, and testing of a web application used for managing visitor announcements within a large technical security platform.
I implemented a REST Web API which integrates with a third-party SDK to enable communication between web interface and core security platform. I also implemented web application for managing visitor announcements.

Projects.Name: Creator-fan social media platform
Projects.Description:
Played a key role in designing, developing, and testing a social platform that transformed interactions between content creators and their fans, introducing features like exclusive content feeds and direct messaging.
I implemented two dashboards: one for platform admins overseeing the entire system and another for agents managing their creators.

Projects.Name: Sport events management system
Projects.Description:
Participated in the design, development, and testing of a platform dedicated to sports events, enabling users to host their own events, join ongoing activities, and monitor their performance seamlessly.
I implemented a REST API that provided backend support for a mobile app.

Projects.Name: Blood donation coordination hub
Projects.Description:
Assisted in the design, development, and testing of a platform that simplifies the blood donation process, allowing users to schedule donations, view donation history, and find nearby donation centers effortlessly.
I implemented an admin dashboard for managing users, tracking donations, and approving donation requests. I also implemented a REST API used by both the admin dashboard and a mobile app providing backend support.

Projects.Name: Installation management network
Projects.Description:
Contributed to the design, development, and testing of a comprehensive platform aimed at facilitating connections between manufacturers and retailers, offering a variety of installation resources such as retail store displays.
I implemented an admin dashboard for managing projects, tracking work orders, and creating installer forms. I also implemented a REST API that provided backend support for the mobile app.

Projects.Name: Technical security solution
Projects.Description:
Worked on the design, development, and testing of a security platform integrating IoT devices such as surveillance cameras, fire detection systems, and access control units for enhanced security management.
I implemented a web dashboard for managing devices and controlling the security platform. I also implemented a desktop dashboard for managing cameras and real-time video streaming.

Projects.Name: Conference device management tool
Projects.Description:
Helped design, develop, and test a platform tailored for managing conference equipment such as microphones and speakers, ensuring streamlined device coordination during events.
I implemented a desktop application for device monitoring and connecting it to the main web dashboard.

As a QA Associate at Nanobit, I was responsible for conducting feature software testing, meticulously searching for bugs, and accurately reproducing reported issues. I excelled in writing detailed bug reports, providing comprehensive information to aid in the resolution process. Additionally, I played a crucial role in giving feedback on software functionalities, contributing to the overall improvement of product quality.

As a QA Associate at UniqCast, I conducted black box testing, both manual and automatic, ensuring the quality and functionality of software products. Additionally, I provided customer support, addressing queries and issues to enhance user experience. I also engaged in some QML programming, contributing directly to software development. Furthermore, I played a role in writing technical documentation, providing valuable resources for users and internal teams.
